name: Missing Pictures: Tsai Ming-Lang
summary: Tsai Ming-Liang is haunted by his childhood memories, memories so vivid they've been impossible to translate into film. In this episode, he shows us why this is the case, in a moving tribute to his grandparents who took him to see two movies every night.
oculus_auto_generated_creator: Atlas V, Serendipity Films, Wild Fang Films, Giioii, Moonshine
